name: The Psychology of Money
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
review: A timeless classic depicting the roaring twenties with its glamour, excess, and disillusionment.

name: How Inovations Works
author: George Orwell
review: A dystopian masterpiece that explores themes of totalitarianism, surveillance, and individual freedom.

name: A Story Telling Work Book for Beginners
author: Jane Austen
review: A classic romance novel exploring themes of social status, manners, and love in Georgian England.

name: The Power Of Postive Thinking
author: Norman Vincent Pealee
review: A powerful portrayal of racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.

name: Inner Engineering
author: Sadhguru
review: A yogis guide to joy. It's a famous book and nework time best seller as well. I love this book

name: The Richeast Man in Babylon
author: George S. Clason
review: An enchanting tale of adventure, friendship, and heroism set in Tolkien's richly imagined world of Middle-earth.
